name: Ebiten Breakout
description:
Help Go gopher get rid of all err's! 

This is my first game made with Ebiten - a nice simple engine which allows you to write games in Go. Also this is the first game I've made public.

Don't expect much from it - it's as simple as it can be, so that the source code remains simple and understandable.

wasmserve makes it easy to serve it here, which is nice.

Source code

Available here!

Controls
  • W - launch ball
  • A/D - move left/right
  • Z - start game, restart game
Credits

Art, Programming, Music, SFX - Elias Daler
